name: Threshold Runner Lite
description:
Help guide a young gnomish wizard home through the enchanted forest. Jump through the trees, over cliffs, and through giant mushrooms while avoiding pitfalls along the way.

Threshold Runner Lite is a simpler prototype of a mobile version that you can find on the iOS App Store and Google Play Store.

Instructions

  • Click or Press Space to Jump.
  • Don't fall into a pit.
  • Have fun!
